Uses of Class
org.xflatdb.xflat.db.EngineBase

  • Packages that use EngineBase 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction
    This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.

    • Uses of EngineBase in org.xflatdb.xflat.db

      Subclasses of EngineBase in org.xflatdb.xflat.db 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ShardedEngineBase<T>
      The base class for all engines that are sharded.
      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.db that return EngineBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EngineBase TableMetadata.getEngine() 
      EngineBase XFlatDatabase.getEngine(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the internal EngineBase that has been spun up to manage the given table.
      EngineBase EngineFactory.newEngine(java.io.File file, java.lang.String tableName, TableConfig config)
      Creates a new Engine in the EngineBase.EngineState#Uninitialized state.
      EngineBase TableMetadata.provideEngine() 
      EngineBase TableMetadata.spinDown(boolean force) 
      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.db with parameters of type EngineBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void EngineTransactionManager.bindEngineToCurrentTransaction(EngineBase engine)
      Called by an engine in order to bind itself to a transaction.
      abstract void EngineTransactionManager.unbindEngineExceptFrom(EngineBase engine, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> transactionIds)
      Unbinds the engine from all its bound and closed transactions except the given collection.
      The engine will not be unbound from any open transactions.

    • Uses of EngineBase in org.xflatdb.xflat.engine

      Subclasses of EngineBase in org.xflatdb.xflat.engine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CachedDocumentEngine
      This is an engine that caches the entire table in memory as a JDOM Document.
      class  IdShardedEngine<T>
      An engine that shards the table based on ID.
      Methods in org.xflatdb.xflat.engine that return EngineBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EngineBase DefaultEngineFactory.newEngine(java.io.File file, java.lang.String tableName, TableConfig config)
      Creates either an IdShardedEngine or a CachedDocumentEngine based on whether the table is sharded.
